summary: Assigning object literals to obj.prototype in a immediately executed function not recognized.

comments.content: This is a major issue for my jQuery build right now.
This is just a warning issue? Not an optimization issue?
Yep. I've got a fix for this. Oddly, this broke due to a hack we inserted a while back for type-casts, and we can remove it now that john fixed the type-cast stuff.
Correct - But if I put out code that generates warnings, I get complaints :-)
This issue was closed by revision 6d38965a1e0a.
